properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, URL, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE_TIP T JOIN MEMBER M ON (MEMBER_NIC = WRITER) WHERE M.STATUS = 'N' AND T.STATUS = 'N' AND M.MEMBER_LEVEL = 10 AND $ LIKE ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, POST_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, URL FROM NOTICE_TIP WHERE POST_NO = ?
SELECT PHOTO_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, NEW_NAME, PATH, FILE_LEVEL FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BOARD_NO = 3 AND POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
